name: (NEW UPDATE!) Bullet Attack!
description:
Bullet Attack is a simple game where you doge the bullets that appear on screen. You can press w, up arrow, or space to move. Pick any gamemode you feel like playing and start your journey to beat the highscore. This game might be buggy because it's still in development and a new update is coming very soon. There's also a secret gamemode ;)

This game supports Windows 10 and Mac 10.2 or higher
